name: Gardens Inc. 2 - The Road to Fame: A Building and Gardening Time Management Game
name_original: Gardens Inc. 2 - The Road to Fame: A Building and Gardening Time Management Game
description:
Jill and Mike are back and need your help winning a contest that will give an immense boost to their gardening business while at the same time reveal the plans of a dastardly thief in this time management adventure.

Now their gardening business is well established in the first installment of the game, Jill and Mike are ready to go further and start taking their business worldwide and try to win lucrative contracts. Meanwhile their nemesis Cliff Gold has escaped from prison and will do all he can to thwart their plans.

***Game Features***
* Design and install beautiful gardens.
* Construct buildings and bridges to achieve goals and aid your progress.
* Enjoy 7 levels for FREE then unlock the full adventure.
* Use your power ups to work faster and collect over 100 achievements and trophies.

If you encounter issues with the game please email: apple-games@gamehousepartners.zendesk.com
